title: Timeline & Animation
description: Learn how to create animations using the timeline and curve editors

steps.title: Timeline Panel
steps.content: The Timeline lets you animate properties over time. Create smooth transitions for positions, opacity, colors, and more.

steps.title: Playhead
steps.content: The playhead shows the current time position. Drag it to scrub through your animation, or use playback controls.

steps.title: Keyframes
steps.content: Keyframes mark property values at specific times. Double-click to add a keyframe at the current playhead position.
steps.details: Tip: Select an object first, then add keyframes for its properties.

steps.title: Animation Tracks
steps.content: Each track controls a different property. Expand tracks to see individual keyframes and adjust timing.

steps.title: Curve Editor
steps.content: The Curve Editor gives you precise control over animation easing. Adjust Bezier handles to create smooth or snappy motion.

steps.title: Bezier Curves
steps.content: Drag curve handles to control acceleration and deceleration. Steeper curves = faster motion, flatter = slower.
